channel.title: Collabora Online - Community Page
channel.description: Recent content on Collabora Online - Community Page
channel.copyright: Unless a license is otherwise specified, content is under CC-BY-SA 3.0

item.title: Build for iOS
item.description: Are you familiar with iOS development environment and interested to learn more while helping the project?

item.title: Contributors
item.description:
Contributors

A huge shoutout to our incredible contributors! Your dedication and hard work are the backbone of the COOL project.

item.title: Debug CODE
item.description: You need to enable debugging support to do any practical interactive debugging.

item.title: Build for Android
item.description: Are you familiar with Android development environment and interested to learn more while helping the project?

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2024
item.description: General Information This is a list of events and sheduled calls intended to help you in your journey in becoming a COOL contributor. We are welcoming contributions under the Online Contributor Representation & Certificate of Origin v1.0. Additional information on contributing might also be useful. Keep an eye for issue tagged with easy hacks or hacktoberfest tag. Events Check all the corresponding issues on GitHub.. Upcoming event: to be confirmed

item.title: Ideas page
item.description: General Information This is a list of project ideas that can be extended by anyone and can then be worked on throughout internships or external programs such as GSoC. All students & developers are welcome to participate in this effort and learn with mentors along the way. We are welcoming contributions under the Online Contributor Representation & Certificate of Origin v1.0. Additional information on contributing might also be useful. Would you like to participate?

item.title: Build Collabora Online
item.description: Are you interested in contributing but don’t know where to start? Head over to the documentation or start by following these step-by-step instructions and build CODE from scratch.

item.title: IDEs & Text Editors
item.description: Tips on how to set your IDE ready for Collabora Online development.

item.title: Easy Hacks
item.description: Check out the starting points for new developers on the project — usually with code pointers helping you to locate the area to hack on easily.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Perhaps your question is one that we have been asked before; have a read, and let us know if not.

item.title: Found a bug?
item.description: Sorry about that — but you can help us resolving it by creating a great bug report! See the steps how to do it, and file the bug on GitHub.

item.title: Translate?
item.description: A great way to get involved. You can perfect CODE for your language, while learning about the feature set, and how things work.

item.title: Communicate
item.description: A great way to get in touch, ask anything or get mentoring is through one of our official channels. . .

item.title: Documentation
item.description: Grab the CODE Getting set up Get involved Your fist commit Watch a talk & grab slides The Collabora Online Development Edition is aimed at home users and contains many of the latest and greatest developments. We want as many people as possible to try it out and get back control of their own online documents. We’d also love to get people involved in our efforts to make Online even better.

item.title: Ashod's tasks.json
item.description: " Choose a color-scheme that is readable and pleasant. :colorscheme murphy " Search highlighting. :set hlsearch :set nu :hi CursorLine cterm=NONE ctermbg=black :hi Search ctermfg=red ctermbg=white :set cursorline set tabstop=4 set softtabstop=0 noexpandtab set shiftwidth=4 " Ignore the case when searching, unless I capitalize. set ignorecase set smartcase let NERDTreeIgnore = ['\.pyc$','\.o$','\.orig$','\.log$','\.gz$','^cscope.*','\~$'] set guifont=DejaVu\ Sans\ Mono\ for\ Powerline\ 11 " Custom word-highlighting... :highlight WRN ctermfg=red :highlight RedBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=1 :highlight GreenBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=2 :highlight KakiBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=3 :highlight BlueBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=4 :highlight MagentaBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=5 :highlight TealBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=6 :highlight WhiteBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=7 :highlight BlackBG ctermfg=15 ctermbg=8 :highlight OrangeBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=9 :highlight DarkGreyBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=10 :highlight MedGreyBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=11 :highlight LightGreyBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=12 :highlight PurpleBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=13 :highlight WhiteBG ctermfg=8 ctermbg=15 " Word-highlighting helpers (thanks to the internet).

item.title: Darshan's launch.json
item.description: { // Use IntelliSense to learn about possible attributes. // Hover to view descriptions of existing attributes. // For more information, visit: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=830387 "version": "0.2.0", "configurations": [ { "type": "chrome", "request": "launch", "name": "Writer", "url": "http://localhost:9980/browser/872228b6a8/debug.html?file_path=/${Your-Work-Directory}/test/data/hello-world.odt", }, { "type": "chrome", "request": "launch", "name": "Calc", "url": "http://localhost:9980/browser/872228b6a8/debug.html?file_path=/${Your-Work-Directory}/test/data/hello-world.ods", }, { "type": "chrome", "request": "launch", "name": "Impress", "url": "http://localhost:9980/browser/872228b6a8/debug.html?file_path=/${Your-Work-Directory}/test/data/hello-world.odp", }, { "type": "chrome", "request": "launch", "name": "Draw", "url": "http://localhost:9980/browser/872228b6a8/debug.html?file_path=/${Your-Work-Directory}/test/data/hello-world.odg", }, { "type": "chrome", "request": "launch", "name": "Nextcloud", "url": "http://192.

item.title: Gokay's launch.json
item.description: { // Use IntelliSense to learn about possible attributes. // Hover to view descriptions of existing attributes. // For more information, visit: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=830387 "version": "0.2.0", "configurations": [ { "name": "(gdb) Attach", "type": "cppdbg", "request": "attach", "program": "${workspaceFolder}/kit/Kit.o", "processId": "${command:pickProcess}", "MIMode": "gdb", "setupCommands": [ { "description": "Enable pretty-printing for gdb", "text": "-enable-pretty-printing", "ignoreFailures": true }, { "description": "Set Disassembly Flavor to Intel", "text": "-gdb-set disassembly-flavor intel", "ignoreFailures": true } ] }, { "name": "(gdb) Launch", "type": "cppdbg", "request": "launch", "program": "${workspaceFolder}/coolwsd", "args": [ "--o:sys_template_path=/home/gokaysatir/Documents/CollaboraOffice/online2205/systemplate" , "--o:security.

item.title: Pranam's c_cpp_properties.json
item.description: { "configurations": [ { "name": "Linux", "includePath": [ "${workspaceFolder}/**", "${workspaceFolder}/common", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/**", "/usr/local/include", "/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu", "/usr/include", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/include", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sc/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sd/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sc/source", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sc/source/ui/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/include/salhelper", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/config_host", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/svx/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/vcl/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sw/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/desktop/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/dbaccess/source/ui/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/reportdesign/source/ui/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sfx2/source/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sd/source/ui/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sdext/source/pdfimport/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/sw/source/uibase/inc", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/workdir/UnpackedTarball/harfbuzz/src", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/workdir/UnoApiHeadersTarget/offapi/comprehensive", "/home/lpranam/work/collabora/libreoffice_2022/workdir/UnoApiHeadersTarget/udkapi/comprehensive" ], "defines": [ "BOOST_ERROR_CODE_HEADER_ONLY", "BOOST_SYSTEM_NO_DEPRECATED", "CPPU_ENV=gcc3", "DBG_UTIL", "LINUX", "OSL_DEBUG_LEVEL=1", "SAL_LOG_INFO", "SAL_LOG_WARN", "UNIX", "UNX", "X86_64", "_DEBUG", "_GLIBCXX_DEBUG", "_PTHREADS", "_REENTRANT", "CPPUNIT_PLUGIN_EXPORT='extern \"C\" SAL_DLLPUBLIC_EXPORT'", "SYSTEM_LIBXML", "EXCEPTIONS_ON", "LIBO_INTERNAL_ONLY" ], "cStandard": "c11", "cppStandard": "c++17" } ], "version": 4 }

item.title: Pranam's tasks.json
item.description: { "tasks": [ { "type": "shell", "label": "build", "command": "make -j && notify-send --app-name=Collabora --icon=\"/usr/share/notificationhelper/collabora_logo.png\" \"Build Complete\" && paplay /usr/share/sounds/build_complete.ogg", "group": { "kind": "build", "isDefault": true }, "args": [], "options": { "cwd": "${workspaceFolder}" }, "presentation": { "focus": true }, "problemMatcher": [ "$gcc" ] }, { "type": "shell", "label": "run", "command": "make", "args": [ "-j", "run", "build-nocheck" ], "options": { "cwd": "${workspaceFolder}" }, "presentation": { "focus": true }, "problemMatcher": [ "$gcc" ] }, { "type": "shell", "label": "g++ build active file", "command": "/usr/bin/g++", "args": [ "-g", "${file}", "-o", "${fileDirname}/${fileBasenameNoExtension}" ], "options": { "cwd": "/usr/bin" } } ], "version": "2.
